channel.title: [$$$] Setting Server On Linux VPS
channel.description:
[B]Hello[/B], I trying to start my server , on VPS i'am already installed Java and Screen , but i cant find good and working command line.
This is original Windows (Not Linux) command line.
[CODE]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit[/CODE]
I'am Using DEBIAN 6 32BIT
Who can help me to edit this line and to run the server ?
[SIZE=4]I will pay [B][I]10$[/I][/B] for the help, I can make payment via Paypal , LibertyReserve, MoneyBookers or WesternUnion[/SIZE]
My Skype: [b]EgidijuR[/b]
